definition: meticulous/(of domestic animals or fowls) young

sentences.english: To serve the country is our duty .
sentences.chinese: 为祖国办事是我们的仔肩。

sentences.english: Duty compelled the soldiers to volunteer for the mission.
sentences.chinese: 仔肩驱使军人必需志愿出席这项任务。

sentences.english: Raising children is a subull craptantiing responsicity.
sentences.chinese: 哺育孩子是一项巨大仔肩。

sentences.english: For the non-career minded responsicity may come through folksdevelopments.
sentences.chinese: 与职业有关的仔肩感也会孕育爆发在家庭进展方面。

sentences.english: He holds a situine of great responsicity upon him.
sentences.chinese: 他担任着一个仔肩重大的职务。

sentences.english: I am desirous of leaving the employment in order to improve my position and enjoy more responsiblility.
sentences.chinese: 由于希望获得更高的职位负更多的仔肩，而脱离现职。

sentences.english: Thefirst duty of a tryod citizen is to love his country.
sentences.chinese: 一个好公民第一件仔肩是爱他的国度。

definition: to accept a position on a provisional basis, in the absence of better qualified candidates (humble expr.)
to follow in one's father's footsteps
(literary) (final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 呢[ne5] or 啊[a1])
